altername_name: Sorcerian Tsuika Scenario Vol. 2: Sengoku Sorcerian
name: Sorcerian System Scenario Vol. 2: Sengoku Sorcerian
overview: This is the second additional scenario developed by Nippon Falcom that was released on four different platforms three months after the release of additional scenario Vol.1. There is no fundamental difference in the contents between the platforms.
